author: Oli Balmford
comment: Used to really love this watch face. But it looks like it no longer supports Android Wear versions below 2 so I can't use it anymore.

author: David Dodge
comment: I don't know if it's a regional thing, or not, but where I live, we wouldn't say "twenty-five past five." We'd say, "five twenty-five." It would be nice to have an option to word it that way.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: As soon, as you receive Android Wear 2.0 update, you can and should add the watchfaces directly from the wearable device. Just hold and swipe left / right.

author: Shawn Denley
comment: It does not show up on my android watch, Moto 2nd gen. I checked both watch apps and Android wear app on phone. Only shows up on the phone.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: As soon, as you receive Android Wear 2.0 update, you can and should add the watchfaces directly from the wearable device. Just hold and swipe left / right.

author: Jordan Lynn
comment: Doesn't show up in Android Wear

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: As soon, as you receive Android Wear 2.0 update, you can and should add the watchfaces directly from the wearable device. Just hold and swipe left / right.

author: Courtney Sylvia
comment: Another watch face purchased, another one that won't show up on my watch or in the Android wear app.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: As soon, as you receive Android Wear 2.0 update, you can and should add the watchfaces directly from the wearable device. Just hold and swipe left / right.

comment: The default faces already look really nice, but a tad more customization would make this app reach five stars. My wishlist (in ascending order): hybrid fuzziness, i.e. text in five minute intervals with four small dots for accuracy by the minute like in Qlocktwo; more fonts; a color slider for each element of the face; a donation button.
title: Very crisp indeed

author: Chris Pugh
comment: ...'odd' in that some of the black designs are actually brighter in ambient mode! Leastways, they are on OLED watches like the Huawei Watch. I'd love the ability to choose my own background and text colour. Still, fuzziness to one or five minutes is a nice touch, as is the date, which is missing from the other fuzzy text faces. Recommended after all. 😛
title: Very nice, but a little odd

author: Patrik Nilsson
comment: Simple with a few amazing looks. Also improved my battery consumption a lot! Got around 40% more battery life compared to my previous watch face app.
title: Simple and good for battery consumption

author: Zach Sanchez
comment: I love the clock style and the colors but an option to put your own images with transparent-ish clock hands or clock hands that adjust to the main colors in the picture would be awesome.
title: Nice but needs custom images

author: Matthew Armstrong
comment: Great design. Would be 5* if I could choose my own colours etc.
title: Nice

author: Brodie
comment: exactly what I was looking for! fuzzy clocks are the best! thanks, dev!
title: this is perfect

author: Sarah S
comment: Simply Perfect Great idea for a smartwatch. Unique and beautiful.

author: Tanya Martin-McClellan
comment: Exactly what I needed

author: James Downes
comment: Looked at the permissions before buying it just to check they aren't outlandish and there is none. You've restored my faith in humanity. 5 stars for you... Update: using it as my watch face, battery life is very good and it looks really nice.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Thank you so much. It's great, to have users like you.

title: Haven't even tried it

author: Tarsha Pete
comment: This does not work for samsung gear live. Can't change colors!        Edit..I have tried changing colors by both, watch and the app itself. I've tried every way. Gives me options to change, but it remains on default watch face.  My android wear app shows updated.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Thank you very much for the hint and sorry for the late reply. Please check out our recent update Textual Watch Face 2.2. We had some issues with Lollipop and some devices with 24 bit color depth. The watch face should show up correctly again. Thank you for your patience.

title: Doesn't work

author: PRUNDAR CIPRIAN
comment: Don't know how to use it or is just not compatible with my Sony sw2..any help???

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Yes, Sony SW2 is no Android Wear device. I am sorry, but we provide our timefaces for Android devices only.

title: Don't understand it

author: Michael Hartman
comment: Quite like this

author: Tayyab Ahmed
comment: Beautiful.

author: Kevin Grim
comment: Since my last favorite watch face inexplicably disappeared, I've been looking everywhere for a worthwhile replacement. This is most definitely it! Love the simple look and efficient method of quickly seeing the time
title: Great replacement for timesh

author: Guy
comment: I like the idea but the French translation is terrible. Please contact me and I'll help you fix it.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: You really helped us a lot with your corrections. We hope you will also enjoy the dark designs. Thank you very much.

title: Good idea, poor translation

author: Elson Jr.
comment: The idea is simple and great for people who simply can't understand clock pointers. The portuguese translation got better since the developer is open to talk to it's users.

author: Thomas Jensen
comment: Very elegant and stylish. Love the Norwegian :)
title: Elegant

author: Sky Siegel
comment: Exquisite

author: Sindre Moen
comment: Love the simplistic design of this watch! If you'd like, I could provide you with Norwegian translations as well, even though I prefer using the English ones myself. If you would provide me a list of the phrases that are used, I'd be happy to translate them.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Sounds great. Please contact us by mail. Maybe I can offer a proposal.

title: Really sweet!

author: Taylor Russell
comment: This is an awesome app with beautiful timefaces that look so much better than the pre-installed choices you're given. You have a lot of designs and colors to choose from, and if you can't choose like me, there's also an option to have it change randomly every hour. When you put the widget on your screen it's 2x2, which is a little too big for me and I wasn't too thrilled with, but after messing around with it for a little bit, I figured out you can hold down to change the size, which is a great feature. 99 cents well spent!

author: Kevin Harold
comment: Very perfect. A couple of days ago when I saw one of my colleagues changed his Android watch timeface, I realized at the first time that everyone's watch can be unique with the help of so many apps. So I started to try all of the timeface apps in the play store, and this one is the best. Great job developers.

author: Nam Anh
comment: Good app! I like this app because it is very beautiful, very nice and convenient. Stable operation. The interface is pretty simple and easy to use. There are apps I regularly active in time in their work . There are many colors to choose me. I am very happy to have it.
Beautiful but would rather have the option to hide the launcher icon on the phone. There's absolutely no need for a watchface to clutter my app list.
title: Really well designed

author: jrmusante1
comment: Well with the new update of the app, the watchface magically appeared on my zenwatch, and it looks great!

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: You may need to update Android Wear before you can install custom watch faces. We have tested this app with the Asus ZenWatch. If the issue will not be resolved with an Android Wear update, please try again with version 1.3, which will be released before end of May. Thank you for your patience.

title: Pretty cool

author: Peter Montero
comment: Great to have the text also in dutch language. One of the better wear apps available.
title: Love this app

author: ROY Berg
comment: Have it on my Wear  and Samsung phone and it I like the way it tells time :-)
title: Love this one

author: Marcus Dean
comment: This has become my favorite wear app.

author: Ridho Ibrahim
comment: Is it possible to add Bahasa Indonesia?
title: Nice

author: Prasma Anindita
comment: Nice clean looking font

author: Oz Uzair
comment: Simple and extremely attractive.  I cant believe it's so cheap i want to buy like 10 of them lol. Download once and fall in love with it forever.
title: Just wow

author: Mohammad Muneer
comment: Get awesome watch faces by having this app! Huge community of people uploading watch faces but, this one is so far my top app on Google play. More than affordable and awesome customization available.  If you got android wear this is a must have app. Genuine quality and superb features. Love it!!
title: All I ever use with my Android Wear

author: Pete Forster
comment: Very good looking watch face, could do with the option to add "minuets to" and "minutes past" to times. Also battery indicator would be nice. Those are all that stops the 5 star rating.
title: Good start

author: Mitchel Humpherys
comment: I'd prefer it to be fuzzier.  It should have a fuzziness setting.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Please check out the new fuzziness feature in release 1.3.

title: "Twenty-nine to nine"

author: Beau Lawson
comment: This app really freshens up the standard smartwatch feel and the text-based time representation has a modern look to it. There are plenty of designs to suit your style as well. Great idea!
title: Classy & Effective

author: Sheldon Cooper
comment: Been rocking it ever since I have downloaded this beautiful app. Extremely light and takes little to none    battery power. So under charged.
title: Personal Favorite
